name: Volt
description: Volt is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a classic design. Its box-like body resembles that of a soldier, giving it a strong and sturdy appearance. The buttons on its surface add a touch of playfulness, reminiscent of a mischievous cat. However, its screen is broken, adding a sense of mystery to its capabilities. Volt is a member of the WebtrES club, a group of robots dedicated to exploring the vast world of the internet.
